author: Victor H.
title: Watch Samsung's MWC 2017 announcement event livestream here
text: Watch Samsung's MWC 2017 announcement event livestream here Watch Samsung's MWC 2017 announcement event livestream here Posted: Tags : Samsung - Samsung + Android - Android + MWC2017 - MWC2017 + Samsung will livestream its MWC 2017 press conference where the company is expected to unveil the brand new Galaxy Tab S3 , a productivity-driven super-tablet that comes as an Android alternative to the Microsoft Surface and Apple iPad Pro . Samsung's MWC livestream might also bring a surprise: we don't expect to see the Galaxy S8 just yet (the next big flagship phone will be announced at a separate event in a month or so), but some news around wearables and / or software are not out of the picture. As usual expect a grandiose event by Samsung, a company known to book the largest audiotoriums and impress with its presentation. Well, at least when things don't get all weird as they did in the distant past. Whatever it is, you can join in Samsung's MWC 2017 livestream right above.
